en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We're sorry, we've lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We're sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We're sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Twitch Prime license.
en.LOST_DLC: We're sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu...
en.TMI_DESCRIPTION: Play a brand new mode that's all about the players
en.BACK_TO_PACK_DESCRIPTION: Exit back to the Party Pack
en.CONNECTING_DELAY:
This is taking a while...
Please check your internet connection.
en.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: on your mobile device to join in
en.POST_GAME_CHOICE_TITLE: What do you want to do now?
en.VOLUME_HOST_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for the host(s).
en.VOLUME_SFX_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for sound effects.
en.VOLUME_MUSIC_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for the music.
en.FAMILY_FRIENDLY_DESCRIPTION: Turn on to avoid the most provocative content...from the game. We can't control the players.
en.AUDIENCE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Turn ON to allow non-players to join and affect the game.
en.TWITCH_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: Require players to be logged into Twitch.
en.MANUAL_CENSORING_DESCRIPTION: Allows the VIP (first player in) to censor players' answers.
en.POSTGAME_SHARING_DESCRIPTION: Allow players to optionally share answers and scores from the game on social media.
en.START_GAMEPAD_DESCRIPTION: Games must be started with controller, not from player devices.
en.HIDE_ROOM_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Allow the on-screen room code to be hidden.
en.SESSION_STATS_DESCRIPTION: Stats from the current play session (These stats will reset when you quit the game.)
en.TWITCH_STATS_DESCRIPTION: Stats from Twitch-locked games (These stats are saved even after you quit the game.)
en.EXTENDED_TIMERS_DESCRIPTION: Extended timers will give you more time to make decisions.
en.MAX_PLAYERS_DESCRIPTION: Number of players that can join the game before people are added to the audience.
en.PREVENT_PICTURES_DESCRIPTION: Prevent photos being used as player avatars.
en.PASSWORD_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Generate a password that players must enter to join the game.
en.AWKWARD_TITLE: WORLD'S BEST PRODUCER OF AWKWARD MOMENTS
en.PHONE_TITLE: MOST IN NEED OF A NEW PHONE
en.COMEDIAN_DESCRIPTION: Lots of likes. Not so many votes.
en.PERSONALITY_B_DESCRIPTION: No, that was a lie, it's <PlayerName>
en.PHONE_DESCRIPTION: Waiting for that contract to end
en.PLASMA_DESCRIPTION: <PlayerName> once sold plasma to buy a Garth Brooks CD
en.CARDS_DESCRIPTION: <PlayerName> collects trading cards of famous dentists
en.TMI_STANDARD_ROUND_GAME_INSTRUCTION: Answer the prompt on your device honestly.
en.TMI_FINAL_ROUND_GAME_INSTRUCTION: Submit one truth and one lie about yourself.
en.ERROR_MISSING_INPUT: Please provide input in all fields.
en.ERROR_CLOSE_TO_TRUTH: You're too close to the truth, enter something else.
en.ERROR_SAME_TRUTH_AND_LIE: You cannot enter the same thing for your truth and lie.
en.SKIP_INTRODUCTION: HIT THIS BUTTON IF YOU WANT TO SKIP THE INTRO
en.CENSOR_REVEAL_TEXT_PROMPT: HIT THIS BUTTON TO REMOVE PLAYER ANSWERS FROM THE SCREEN
en.INITIAL_VOTE_AUDIENCE_PROMPT: VOTE FOR THE AUDIENCE BONUS ROLE. THE WINNER OF THIS ROLE WILL RECEIVE EXTRA SCIENCE PELLETS.
en.GET_IN_CHARACTER_VOTE_PROMPT: BASED ON THEIR ANSWER, WHO MAKES THE BEST %s?
en.JUDGEMENT_INSTRUCTION_PROMPT: %s DECIDES WHETHER %s OR %s GETS THE ABOVE ROLE.
en.POWERS_STEAL_INSTRUCTION: IT'S CLEAR FROM THIS ROLE THAT %s IS PRETTY SNEAKY, SO NO ONE WILL BE SURPRISED WHEN THEY STEAL SOME SCIENCE PELLETS.
en.POWERS_DONATE_INSTRUCTION: BASED ON THIS ROLE, %s IS EXTREMELY WEALTHY, SO THEY WON’T MIND DONATING SOME OF THEIR SCIENCE PELLETS.
en.POWERS_GIVE_INSTRUCTION: JUDGING BY THIS ROLE, %s IS A REAL HERO. THEY WILL NOW PICK A SIDEKICK TO REWARD WITH EXTRA SCIENCE PELLETS.
en.POWERS_STEAL_CHOICE_PROMPT: SELECT A TARGET TO STEAL FROM!
en.POWERS_DONATE_CHOICE_PROMPT: SELECT THE LUCKY RECIPIENT OF YOUR DONATION!
en.POWERS_GIVE_RESULT: %s PICKED %s AS THEIR SIDEKICK! THEY GET SOME SCIENCE PELLETS!
en.POWERS_STEAL_FAILURE: %s COULD'VE STOLEN SCIENCE PELLETS, BUT DIDN'T. WEIRD.
en.POWERS_DONATE_FAILURE: %s COULD'VE DONATED SCIENCE PELLETS, BUT DIDN'T! EVERYONE BENEFITS FROM %s'S INDECISION.
en.POWERS_GIVE_FAILURE: %s COULD'VE PICKED A SIDEKICK, BUT DIDN'T! THEY LOSE %d PELLETS!
en.RECOUNT_INSTRUCTION_PROMPT: RECOUNT! EVERYONE VOTE ON WHO DESERVES THE ABOVE ROLE!
en.AUDIENCE_SPLIT_VOTE_PROMPT: WHICH ROLE DO YOU THINK %s FITS BEST?
en.TAG_CHOICE_PROMPT: DRAG EACH SUBJECT ONTO THE TRAIT THAT FITS THEM.
en.TAG_CHOICE_SINGLE_PLAYER_PROMPT: CHOOSE THE CHARACTERISTIC THAT FITS %s BETTER.
en.TAG_RESOLUTION_TEMP_PROMPT: TYPE SOMETHING TO PROVE YOU'RE MORE %s!
en.TAG_RESOLUTION_VOTE_PROMPT: BASED ON THEIR ANSWER, WHICH SUBJECT FITS THE CHARACTERISTIC?
en.TAG_CONTRADICTION_TEMP_PROMPT: WRITE THE FIRST %s THAT COMES TO YOUR MIND!
en.TAG_CONTRADICTION_VOTE_PROMPT: PICK THE CHARACTERISTIC THAT FITS %s'S ANSWER BEST!
en.TAG_CONTRADICTION_PRIMARY_PLAYER_VOTE_PR: PICK THE CHARACTERISTIC YOU THINK EVERYONE ELSE WILL PICK FOR YOUR ANSWER!
en.FIGHT_JUST_PLAYING_VOTE_PROMPT: WHOSE ANSWER MATCHED THEIR CHARACTERISTIC THE BEST?
